文档符合性检查包括大部分片段级别检查，还请确保以下：The document conformance checks include most of the fragment-level checks and also ensure the following:

-顶级项没有 XML 声明、 DTD、 元素、 注释、 空格或处理指令以外的任何节点。- The top-level item doesn't have any nodes other than XML Declaration, DTD, element, comment, white space, or processing instruction.
